item.description:
Another night of forro at Braza Grill hosted this time by both Elsa and Johanny.

The last Braza Grill meetups have been a good time so why not return for more fun.

Check out this link for information about Braza Grill http://www.brazabarandgrill.com/

8:30   until 10:00:  Forro Class  $10
10:00 until closing: Dancing to Live Band

 

There is no obligation to take the class and/or dance so you are free to sit, watch and chat.  If you arrive hungry, there is also plenty of food that can be taken into the bar/club area.

 

The band usually comes on between 10 and 10:30 and it can get pretty busy in there, so do try to make yourself known before then if possible.

 

When you arrive, the restaurant area will be on your left and the club area on your right. We will be in the Club area. Look for us near the dance floor or just to the left of it.

 

Looking forward to seeing you!
item.how_to_find_us: We will select a table near the dance floor to start, but depending on how many people want to attend and loudness level, we may move towards the right side of the dance floor toward the wall as you enter.

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Another Night of Forro Dancing at Braza Grill
